## ScaleTrack.(constructor)

Create an instance of ScaleTrack from keyframe values

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(mode: InterpolationMode, keyFrames: {
        time: number;
        value: Vector3;
    }[]);
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mode | [InterpolationMode](doc/markdown/./base.interpolationmode.md) | The interpolation mode of keyframes |
